thread.title: Little girl's argument with dad about how to count to five is sweet | Metro News
thread.title_full: Little girl's argument with dad about how to count to five is sweet | Metro News

author: Hattie Gladwell For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Little girl's argument with dad about how to count to five is sweet | Metro News
text:
Follow us This little girl’s argument with her dad about how to count to five is hilariously sweet Hattie Gladwell for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 3:57 pm (Picture: Publicado por NTD Television) 
If you thought you were good at standing your ground, you’d better think again – because one little girl is totally deserving of the ‘Queen of arguments’ title. Marathon training weeks 4 and 5: into the weights room 
After being told by her father that the correct way to count to five was ‘1, 2, 3, 4, 5,’ the little girl, Aleah, refused to have any of it. 
She was just adamant that there was no number four involved on the way to five – despite knowing that four comes after three. (Picture: Publicado por NTD Television) 
Perhaps she knew she was making a mistake and had too much pride to admit it, or maybe she’s just really sure that despite knowing there is a four in the world of numbers, there’s no use for it when counting to five. 
Whatever was going on in her little head as she continuously argued with daddy – the video of the argument, which was filmed by Aleah’s mother – is almost too cute (and hilarious) to handle.
